about_the_game:
About the game
Stigma Plane Walker is a VR rhythm action game where you can enjoy moving your body to a note that flies to the beat. Stretch your fists to throw punches, swing knives and dodge flying obstacles to beat your enemies with exciting music. De-stress with thrilling workouts and reach your highscore to put your name on the leaderboards. Become a hero in the fantasy world with the branded plane walker.



Characteristic
  • Places and boss monsters in the fantasy world of Planewalker with four stigmas welcome you. Defeat the boss using gloves and swords.
  • Collect the main characters you can meet in the stigma Planewalker webtoon. If you achieve achievements through gameplay, such as reaching 5000 points for song play or reaching 3rd place in the season high score, you will receive a character profile icon as a reward.
  • Compete with players from all over the world and challenge the top 5 players with the points earned through rhythm game play for each song. Your score and name fuel the enthusiasm of players. Try again even if you are not in the Hall of Fame. The top 5 roster is reset every season.
  • Cleave notes flying in various directions, throw punches and dodge them by moving your body. Through play that moves the whole body

About the game
Stigma Plane Walker is a VR rhythm action game where you can enjoy moving your body to a note that flies to the beat. Stretch your fists to throw punches, swing knives and dodge flying obstacles to beat your enemies with exciting music. De-stress with thrilling workouts and reach your highscore to put your name on the leaderboards. Become a hero in the fantasy world with the branded plane walker.

  • Collect the main characters you can meet in the stigma Planewalker webtoon. If you achieve achievements through gameplay, such as reaching 5000 points for song play or reaching 3rd place in the season high score, you will receive a character profile icon as a reward.
  • Compete with players from all over the world and challenge the top 5 players with the points earned through rhythm game play for each song. Your score and name fuel the enthusiasm of players. Try again even if you are not in the Hall of Fame. The top 5 roster is reset every season.

name: Beat Back VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
  • VR Support: Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: vr only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1660
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest2
  • Additional Notes: vr only

short_description: This game is a rhythm game in which you move your body and destroy flying magic balls. Blow away your stress with a powerful blow, and collect various cards
supported_languages:
English*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
